txt.en: Odo Mudbottom is distraught that his favourite eating-place, The Floating Log, is currently undergoing repairs to its roof.

'I've eaten at The Floating Log almost every night for the past twenty years, but now they're working on the roof, and if you try and eat there you get plaster falling into your dishes!

'I refuse to eat there while the repairs are going on. I mean, honestly! I have my standards, and for mushroom pies I demand they be plaster-free! Is that too much to ask? I think not!

'If you know a worthy cook, I'd pay you for two mushroom pies, with coins and goods. I still need to eat, you know!'
Odo Mudbottom is in Frogmorton.\n\nOdo refuses to eat at The Floating Log while the repairs on the roof are underway, but he still wants his customary mushroom pies.
'These pies look delicious! Thank you, [placeholder] -- maybe I don't need The Floating Log after all!\n\n'Take these coins and other small items with my good wishes!'
Odo Mudbottom is in Frogmorton.\n\nOdo refuses to eat at The Floating Log while the repairs on the roof are underway, but he still wants his customary mushroom pies.
'No one wants to eat mushroom pies with plaster in them!'
'I'm hungry, and you haven't brought me the mushroom pies I requested!'
'They should just close down the inn while the repairs are on, if you ask me!'
'They should just close down the inn while the repairs are on, if you ask me!'
Bring mushroom pies to Odo Mudbottom
